level.heading: Alienation of benefits.
level.text: Benefits of the retirement programs provided for herein shall not be assigned or alienated, except to the extent expressly permitted by this chapter or by another applicable law.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-152, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1-901.01.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Application of Law 12-152: See Historical and Statutory Notes following § 1- 901.01.
